txt.en: Orodir is located next to Naerband.\n\nYou should complete quests within this encampment.

Akhrûn looks out across the span towards Orodir.

'I was taken here with my brethren in cages. We were told that we did not uphold the great laws that Sauron has put in place over Mordor. Our punishment was to be bound by chains.

'Orodir has many of the Orcs of fire, known as Ghâsh-hai. I hear that they came to Naerband soon after the tower fell. I do not know why though.

'We must rescue as many Nurnhoth as we can and stop Naerband from abducting those who deserve their freedom.'
This place seems to be a staging area for bringing captured prisoners into Naerband
Akhrûn can be found just outside of Orodir, next to Naerband.\n\nYou should speak with Akhrûn.
Orodir is located next to Naerband.\n\nYou should enter the encampment.
Akhrûn is not able to turn her back on her fellow Nurnhoth still imprisoned by servants of Naerband, and asks for your help in freeing them.

'We are together again! We shall depart and take a long and secretive footpath over the mountains to Nurn. You have done much and I thank you. No longer do you need to risk your life to help me though. We can manage from here.'
